text: Khoroshovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Beketovsky Selsoviet, Yermekeyevsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 5 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 49 km from Yermekeyevo, 24 km from Beketovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Yermekeyevsky District
title: Khoroshovka
